title: Design Thinking-Based New Business Model Creation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, continuously monitoring learning effectiveness through formative assessments

learning_goals: One business idea based on actual market needs can be developed by applying the design thinking process
A concrete business model can be designed and presented using tools such as the Business Model Canvas
Three prototypes improving the business model can be developed based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
